item.title: 1147 MGM
item.description: score:1147 Chances: MGM Resorts’ second-quarter 2023 results gain from increased business volume and travel activity, indicating positive performance in the travel and hospitality sector. MGM (MGM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 11.32% and 4.80%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2023, suggesting strong financial performance.
